restart confirmation: Are you sure you want to restart the game?
restart confirmation 2: This action will restart the game and you will lose all progress. Are you sure you want to continue?
continue or start over: Do you want to continue or start over?
cardboard has line: The card has a completed line.
no bingo nor line: The card has neither bingo nor a line.
how many cards to generate: How many cards do you want to generate?
valid number greater than 0: Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
